item.title: Informatic developpement
item.author: contact@pverte.me (Pverte)
item.description: Sometimes I develop things, because I’ve got some knowledges in Python and in some other languages. You can find most of the source code on my Github Pafi Pafi is a discord bot that can find all the links to listen to a music from one link or from a search. Still not finished

item.title: Podcasts
item.author: contact@pverte.me (Pverte)
item.description: In 2020, during the first lockdown, I decide to create a webradio, to talk about unknown creators, though with a lot of talent. Today (2022), I work less on it, having less time with classes (it’s hard to have free time in high school), so I release a show every 2 to 4 months. The podcasts I created La Radio Pomme Raconte La Radio Pomme Raconte is my first podcast, where I talk about creations that are unknown to the general public, but that deserve to be recognized

item.title: Privacy Policies and Terms of Services
item.author: contact@pverte.me (Pverte)
item.description: Privacy Very simple : this website don’t take any informations about you and your browser. If you would like to contact the website owner, you can send an email to : contact@pverte.me Term of services By going on this website, you accept these rules (sound scary) : Every photos, exept with contrary mentions, are mine. You are not allowed to use it if I didn’t give you a written permission
